author: Julie Muncy
title: The PlayStation 5 Will Have a Sweet New Controller
description: Along with some big design upgrades, Sony says it's supposed to have better battery life to boot.
content:
Greetings, and welcome to Replay, WIRED's rundown of all of the week's big videogame news. This time around we have news about the forthcoming PlayStation 5, Final Fantasy XIV, and Google Stadia. Let's get going, shall we?
... And it seems like a nice one! I… [+2990 chars]
